metadata.title: Subash Maharjan | Senior Frontend Developer
metadata.description: Subash Maharjan is a Senior Frontend Developer, experienced in creating beautiful and functional websites and web applications.

hero.paragraph: My passion is rooted in the constant pursuit of technical excellence and UI/UX harmony.  I find deep satisfaction in turning complex architectural challenges into seamless, future-proof digital solutions.

aboutme.name: Subash Maharjan
bioParagraphs: Senior Frontend Engineer & UI Architect with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance, enterprise-grade web applications. I bridge the gap between sophisticated engineering and human-centric design, specializing in React, Angular, and Vue ecosystems

Currently, I focus on the intersection of Frontend Engineering and Applied AI, integrating LLMs and predictive analytics to build 'intelligent' interfaces. From deploying RAG-based conversational UIs to optimizing client-side performance for real-time AI insights, I build products that don't just function—they anticipate user needs. I bring a blend of technical leadership and design thinking to help teams transform complex requirements into scalable, future-proof digital experiences.

resume.resumeParagraph: You can check my resumé in the link below.

mba.desc: Focus on modern web technologies and agile software development practices.

bca.desc: Focusing on network administration, IT security, and web development.

caci.title: Senior Software Engineer
caci.desc: Designed a standardized library of accessible UI components using Angular Material UI.

travelers.title: Software Engineer II
travelers.desc: Created an accessible component library adopted company-wide using StencilJS.
